Header: Outgoing US Defence Attaché Calls on Commander of the Army
Content: The outgoing Defence Attaché at the US Embassy in Colombo, Lieutenant Colonel Douglas Hess paid a courtesy call on the Commander of the Army, Lieutenant General Mahesh Senanayake this morning (17) at the Army Headquarters. The US Defence Attaché paid his gratitude to the Commander of the Army for the cordial relationship during his tenure. At the end of the cordial meeting Commander of the Army presented a special memento to the outgoing Defence Attaché for his cooperation with the Sri Lanka Army during his stay in Sri Lanka.
